operations.description: Sends our email with SendGrid API
The functions Twilio calls when it recieves a text
Chooses a winning email by random
Sends a text message with Twilio

tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM twilio.send_message
  WHERE mediaTypeExtension='.json'
  AND AccountSid=@sid		-- Set this in environment variables
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'To' : @recipient,
    'From' : @phonenum,		-- Set this in environment variables
    'Body' : "Remember to come back to the Transposit booth at 4:30pm for the raffle!"
  })

operations.description: Sends a reminder to all entries by text to return
Returns a list of all emails in Airtable

tql.tql:
SELECT fields.email FROM airtable.get_records
  WHERE baseId=@baseid		-- Set this in environment variables
  AND table='Emails'
